meanings.sent1: The garbage dump had the yukkiest smell imaginable.
meanings.sent2: That rotten egg had the yukkiest taste ever.
meanings.sent3: The yukkiest part of the prank was when the fake spider fell on his head.
meanings.sent4: The yukkiest memories clung to her like sticky mud.
meanings.sent5: The slimy, moldy sandwich was the yukkiest thing I had ever seen.

meanings.sent1: The yukkiest is always saved for last in the haunted house.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the thought of touching the yukkiest in the mystery box.
meanings.sent3: The yukkiest in the horror movie turned out to be a cute puppy in a costume.
meanings.sent4: The yukkiest of the situation was the unexpected twist at the end.
meanings.sent5: The yukkiest of all was the slimy, green goo dripping from the ceiling.
